FuncDef: This command associates an IP filter policy with an ingress or egress Service Access Point (SAP). Filter policies control the forwarding and dropping of packets based on the matching criteria.

ParaDef.Info: Keyword indicating the filter policy is an IP filter.
Specifies the ID for the IP filter policy. Allowed values are an integer in the range of 1 and 65535 that corresponds to a previously created IP filter policy in the configure>filter context.
